message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $20,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $18,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  I can come down a bit to $19,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $17,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
